title: Season Preview with Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Zach and ESPN's Jeff Van Gundy talk about all the contract extensions and Draymond Green's tenure in Golden State. Then they make Finals predictions, figure out the playoff fields, under the radar teams, a surprising player for the Lakers to target, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
